function currentCursorPos()
  if player_color == 'Black' then
    pos = Player.Black.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'White' then
    pos = Player.White.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Red' then
    pos = Player.Red.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Blue' then
    pos = Player.Blue.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Yellow' then
    pos = Player.Yellow.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Green' then
    pos = Player.Green.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Orange' then
    pos = Player.Orange.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Teal' then
    pos = Player.Teal.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Purple' then
    pos = Player.Purple.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Pink' then
    pos = Player.Pink.getPointerPosition()
  elseif player_color == 'Brown' then
    pos = Player.Brown.getPointerPosition()
  else
    pos = {0,2,0}
  end
end

function onScriptingButtonUp(index, color)
  player_color = color
  currentCursorPos()
  print('Player.' .. player_color .. '.getPointerPosition() = ')
  if index == 1 then --Spawn Used Marker
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Model',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
    }
    object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      --    image = "https://i.imgur.com/kxD7CdS.png",
      --    image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/2A7ipod.png",
      --    type = 3,
      --    thickness = 0.7,
      mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771425863759135/FF3D35EB3BE15194DE33F8D3EDBE3ED9E49CFBDC/",
      diffuse = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771425863736260/10176EA475B6024F601AD5D79BC0AE8598C884FF/",
      type = 1,
      material = 3,
    }
    object.setCustomObject(params)
    object.setName("USED")
  elseif index == 2 then --Spawn smoke/damage Marker
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Tile',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=0.5, y=1, z=0.5},
    }
    object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      image = "https://i.imgur.com/dciTjsz.png",
      image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/y9AyKj2.png",
      type = 3,
      thickness = 0.7,
    }
    object.setCustomObject(params)
    object.setName("Smoke")
  elseif index == 3 then --Spawn upgrade/hack Marker
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Tile',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=0.5, y=1, z=0.5},
    }
    object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      image = "https://i.imgur.com/pQDUSES.png",
      image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/D5BFVjB.png",
      type = 2,
      thickness = 0.7,
    }
    object.setCustomObject(params)
    object.setName("Upgrade")
  elseif index == 4 then --Spawn Prepare Marker
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Tile',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=0.5, y=1, z=0.5},
    }
    object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      image = "https://i.imgur.com/pzMaLiw.png",
      image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/HOWDmld.png",
      type = 1,
      thickness = 0.7,
    }
    object.setCustomObject(params)
    object.setName("Prepare")
  elseif index == 5 then --Spawn Overwatch Marker
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Tile',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=0.5, y=1, z=0.5},
    }
    object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      image = "https://i.imgur.com/Gtqpn3g.png",
      image_bottom = "https://i.imgur.com/6QMRtHM.png",
      type = 1,
      thickness = 0.7,
    }
    object.setCustomObject(params)
    object.setName("Overwatch")
    end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
Cannot be broken or unlocked from inside. Must have access code or hack (11+MD) to unlock and an automatic action to open. Those closed inside get reroll against collateral damage and cannot be damaged by outside attacks.

makes survival checks like a micro ship with a bonus of +MD. Functions in a broken or slagged cargo bay. If it is destroyed, it will open.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
(Single Use)
Requires launch and use of an adjacent Missile Bay. It rolls 3 dice to hit and adds 2 to the total, moves 8 hexes per phase, has a 3 dice damage explosive payload that starts a fire in the module of impact. It only gets one damaged marker each time it is hit. It reduces the difficulty of its survival checks by 3 and may reroll one or both dice in a failed survival check

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
(Left/Right/Off)
Any skill check to turn in the indicated direction is at
3 lower difficulty. It is 3 harder to turn in the opposite
direction. If it is turned off or broken, it has no effect.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
Halve distance for scans and yes/no questions. Also
gives all characters a reroll on any checks to avoid a
navigation hazard.
Ignore 1 used marker on the Teleporter.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: Allows you to have one additional crew aboard. If functional and all regular Life Support Modules are down, it provides Life Support at the end of the Round to all occupants within its Cargo Bay.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
(Requires External Facing)
 This item allows a ship to launch Fighters and Drones from this Cargo Bay. The Fighters and Drones also take up slots in the Cargo Bay.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: You may reroll one die in your failed hull check.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: The ship reduces OOC by 2 instead of 1 at the end of each Phase.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: Fighters are detailed on core rulebook page 122.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: Drones are unmanned fighters. They behave as a bot in a fighter except as noted here. Drones move 4 hexes/phase. They have Piloting and Combat skills of 3 but get rerolls in nothing. Drones are microships. Drones require a Launch Tube Cargo Bay item in the same Cargo Bay to launch.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: A ship equipped with a functioning Damage Control lowers the difficulty for module repairs by one. You may expend the Damage Control as an action in the Cargo Bay and make an Engineering check vs. 0. Each point of success allows you to remove one point of hull damage from the ship.

Everything in the Cargo Bay gets a free reroll against
all incoming collateral damage. This item functions in
a broken but not a slagged Cargo Bay.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description:
automatic battlestation action. Roll 3 dice. The highest
generates OOC, middle is hull  damage. Change the
ship’s speed by the lowest die (to a maximum of 5).
This object requires external rear facing to accelerate
or external forward facing to decelerate.

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Token
ContainedObjects.Description: These devices ignore OOC, have a Skill of 4 with a  professional reroll and can only be used to operate a given module type remotely but with no remote penalty.

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.Description:
Left click - Increase
Right click - Decrease
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true
    val = 0

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0.6,0,100}
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      tooltip=ttText,
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,-0.4},
      height=600,
      width=1000,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=800,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={0,0,0,0}
      })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(),
        input_function = "editName",
        tooltip=ttText,
        label = "Counter",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,1.5},
        width = 1200,
        height = 1000,
        font_size = 300,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })


    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide value in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show value in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.2},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.6},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=150,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })


    self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        tooltip="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,1.4},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and 1 or -1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
        updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
spacing = 0.124
boardtop = -0.93
val = -0.93
subphase = 0
--phase = 1

function onload(saved_data)
--self.createButton({click_function = 'next',    function_owner = self, label = '', index=0,   position = {0,0.11,0},    rotation = {0,0,0}, scale = {0.5,0.5,0.5},   width = 1600,    height = 1800,    font_size = 100, color={0,1,0,0}})
self.createButton({click_function = 'next',    function_owner = self, label = '', index=0,   position = {0,0.05,0},    rotation = {0,0,0}, scale = {0.5,0.5,0.5},   width = 1600,    height = 1800,    font_size = 100, color={0,1,0,0}})
self.createButton({click_function = 'next',    function_owner = self, label = '', index=1,   position = {0,0.1,-0.93},    rotation = {0,0,0}, scale = {0.5,0.5,0.5},   width = 1800,    height = 100,    font_size = 100, color={1,0,1,0.7}, hover_color={1,0,1,0.7}, press_color={0,0,1,0.7}})

end

function none()
end

function next()
    endSpecial()
    if subphase > 13 then
      subphase = 1
    end
    subphase = subphase + 1
    val = boardtop + (spacing * subphase)
    self.editButton({index=1, position = {0,0.1,val}})
    startSpecial()
end

function startSpecial()
  print("subphase start ",subphase)
  if subphase == 1 then
    markPhaseDie()
    triggerHyperdrive()
  end
  if subphase == 3 then
    if PhaseDie.getValue() == 1 then findShipStatus() end
  end
  if subphase == 4 then
    findHelmControl()
  end
  if subphase == 5 then
    findChasers()
  end
  if subphase == 6 then
    findHeroes()
  end
  if subphase == 7 then
    sleepHeroes()
    findEnemies()
  end
  if subphase == 8 then
    sleepEnemies()
  end
  if subphase == 9 then
    findEffects()
  end
  if subphase == 11 then
    findShipStatus()
  end
  if subphase == 12 then
    if PhaseDie.getValue() == 6 then findShipStatus() end
  end
  if subphase == 13 then
    if PhaseDie.getValue() == 6 then findUsedMarkers() end
  end
  if subphase == 14 then
    triggerPhaseDie()
  end
end

function endSpecial()
  print("subphase end ",subphase)
  clearHighlights()
end

function triggerPhaseDie()
  print(PhaseDie)
  PhaseDie.highlightOn({0,1,1,1})
  if PhaseDie.getValue() < 6 then
    PhaseDie.setValue(PhaseDie.getValue()+1)
    print("Value = ", PhaseDie.getValue())
  else
    PhaseDie.setValue(1)
    print("Value = ", PhaseDie.getValue())
  end
end


function triggerHyperdrive()
  print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
  local allObjects = getAllObjects()
  local foundFigurine = false
  for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
    name = object.getName()
    if name == "hyperdrive" then
      object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
      print("hyperdrive found! tag is ", object.tag)
      local ping = object.getPosition()
      Player["White"].pingTable(ping)
      foundFigurine = true
    end
  end
  if foundFigurine == false then
      print("No hyperdrive")
  end
  print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end


function markPhaseDie()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "Phase Die" then
        PhaseDie = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                --object.highlightOn({0,1,1,1})
                --print("Phase Die found! tag is ", object.tag)
                --if object.getValue() < 6 then
                --  object.setValue(object.getValue()+1)
                  --print("Value = ", object.getValue())
                --else
                --  object.setValue(1)
                  --print("Value = ", object.getValue())
                --end
          print(PhaseDie)
          foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No Phase Die")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

function findShipStatus()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "Hero Ship Status" or name == "Enemy Ship Status" then
        object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
        print("Status found! tag is ", object.tag)
        ping = object.getPosition()

        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No Ship Status boards")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

function findHelmControl()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "Helm Control" then
        object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
        print("Status found! tag is ", object.tag)
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No Helm Control boards")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end


function findChasers()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "Chasers" then
                object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
                print("Chasers found! tag is ", object.tag)
                foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No boards named 'Chasers'")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end


function findHeroes()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      if object.getVar('hero') ~= nil then
        object.setVar('hpbarcolor' , 'red')
        object.call('colorBar')
        if object.getVar('hl') ~= nil then
                object.highlightOn(object.getVar('hl'))
                print("hero found! tag is ", object.tag)
        else
          object.highlightOn({1,1,1,1})
        end
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No heroes with higlights")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

function sleepHeroes()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      if object.getVar('hero') ~= nil then
        object.setVar('hpbarcolor' , 'grey')
        object.call('colorBar')
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No heroes with higlights")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end



function findEnemies()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      if object.getVar('enemy') ~= nil then
        if object.getVar('hpbarcolor') ~= nil then
          object.setVar('hpbarcolor' , 'red')
          object.call('colorBar')
        end
        if object.getVar('hl') ~= nil then
          object.highlightOn(object.getVar('hl'))
          --print("Enemies found! check is ", object.getVar('hl'), object.getTable('hl'))
          foundFigurine = true
        else
          object.highlightOn({1,1,1,1})
        end
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No enemy figurines found")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end



function sleepEnemies()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      if object.getVar('enemy') ~= nil then
        if object.getVar('hpbarcolor') ~= nil then
          object.setVar('hpbarcolor' , 'grey')
          object.call('colorBar')
        end
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No enemy figurines found")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end


function findEffects()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "plasma fire" then
        object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
        --print("Enemies found! check is ", object.getVar('hl'), object.getTable('hl'))
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("no effects found")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

function findUsedMarkers()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
      name = object.getName()
      if name == "used" then
        object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
        --print("Enemies found! check is ", object.getVar('hl'), object.getTable('hl'))
        foundFigurine = true
      end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("no used markers found")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end



function clearHighlights()
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
                object.highlightOff()
  end
end

ContainedObjects.Name: Custom_Tile
ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
local distance = 1

function onload()

  self.createButton({
       label="Sync", click_function="findByDistance",
       function_owner=self, position={0.7,0,0.5},
       height=300, width=320, font_size=70
   })

   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveE',    function_owner = self,    label = 'E',    position = {0,0,0.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveW',    function_owner = self,    label = 'W',    position = {-0.8,0,0.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveN',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {-0.4,0,-0.3},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveS',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {-0.4,0,0.5},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'Fall',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {0.7,0,-0.3},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Stand',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {0.7,0,0.5},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
end

function MoveE()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x+distance,pos.y+0.3,pos.z})
 end


function MoveW()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x-distance,pos.y+0.3,pos.z})
end

function MoveN()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.3,pos.z+distance})
end

function MoveS()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.3,pos.z-distance})
end

function Fall()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.3,pos.z+(distance/2)})
     mini.setRotation({270, 0, 0})
end

function Stand()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.3,pos.z-(distance/3)})
     mini.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
end

function findByDistance()
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
        if object.tag == "Tileset" then
            --I have a pre-written function to get distance to objects
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 5 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
  local color = self.getColorTint()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
  mini.setColorTint(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 5 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

title = 'campaign'

function onSave()
  --print("saving")
  local data_to_save = {
    title = title
  }

  return saved_data
end

end


function editTitle(_obj, _string, value)
  title = value
  self.editInput({index = 0, value = title})
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
function onload(saved_data)
    f_size = 260
    light_mode = false
    center_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        center_mode = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, center_mode, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0,0,95}
    end

    if center_mode then
        f_align = 3
    else
        f_align = 1
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = self.getName() .. "\n----------\n" .. self.getDescription()
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(), 
        input_function = "editName", 
        label = "Notecard",
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,-1}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 300, 
        font_size = 160, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getDescription(), 
        label = "\nClick and type here\n\nFlip for settings",
        input_function = "editDesc", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position = {0,0.05,0.28}, 
        width = 1800, 
        height = 1000, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0},
        tooltip = ttText
        })

    self.createButton({
        label="- Notecard Settings -",
        tooltip="- Notecard Settings -",
        click_function="null",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=300,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=140,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if center_mode then
        centerButtonText = "[ Set left align ]"
    else
        centerButtonText = "[ Set center align ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=centerButtonText,
        tooltip=centerButtonText,
        click_function="swap_align",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide description in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show description in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.5},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=800,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=100,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "Sample Text",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample", 
        function_owner = self, 
        alignment = f_align,
        position={0,-0.05,1.1},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 1800, 
        height = 250, 
        font_size = 120, 
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeInput(2)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function update_fcolor()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function editDesc(_obj, _string, value) 
    self.setDescription(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function setTooltips()
    title = self.getName()
    if title == "" then
        title = "Notecard"
    end
    desc = self.getDescription()

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = title .. "\n----------\n" .. desc
    else
        ttText = ""
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editInput({
        index = 1,
        value = self.getDescription(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value) 
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local distance = 1

function onSave()
--print("starting onsave()")
  data_to_save={}
  if (mini~=nil) then
  --  print("mini~=nil")
    data_to_save={miniguid=mini.guid}
  --  print("data_to_save = ", data_to_save)
  end
--  print("encoding data...")
  saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
--  print("returnign saved data", saved_data)
  return saved_data
end


function onload(saved_data)
  if (saved_data~=nil) then
    loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
    if (loaded_data.miniguid ~= nil) then
      mini = getObjectFromGUID(loaded_data.miniguid)
    end
  end

  self.createButton({
       label="Sync", click_function="findByDistance",
       function_owner=self, position={0,0,0},
       height=410, width=410, font_size=70
   })

   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveE',    function_owner = self,    label = 'E',    position = {1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveW',    function_owner = self,    label = 'W',    position = {-1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveN',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {-0,0,-1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveS',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {-0,0,1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Fall',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {0.7,0,-0.3},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Stand',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {0.7,0,0.5},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
end

function Fall()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+(distance/2)})
     mini.setRotation({270, 0, 0})
     print(mini.guid)
end

function MoveE()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x+distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
 end


function MoveW()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x-distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
end

function MoveN()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+distance})
end

function MoveS()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-distance})
end

function Stand()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-(distance/3)})
     mini.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
print(obj)
print(highlight)
print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" or "Tileset" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          mini.setVar('hero', 'true')
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'), ", mini.hero = ", mini.getVar('hero'))
              else
                print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 5 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and 1 or -1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
        updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
function onload()
self.createButton({click_function = "removeUsedMarkers", function_owner = self, label = "X", position = {0.0, 0.0, 0.0}, scale = {1.8, 1.8, 1.8}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400, color = {0,0,0,0}, tooltip = "Remove Used Markers"})
end

function removeUsedMarkers()
  for _,obj in ipairs(getAllObjects()) do
           if string.lower(obj.getName()) == "used" then
               obj.destruct()
           end
         end
       end

function EStoSpecies()

      else
        figure.setDescription(EquipA .. "\n" .. EquipB .. "\n" .. EquipC .. "\n" .. EquipD)

      if pro==1 then figure.setColorTint({1,0,0,1}) end --marine
      if pro==2 then figure.setColorTint({0.4,0.4,1,1}) end --engineer
      if pro==3 then figure.setColorTint({1,0.9,0,1}) end --pilot
      if pro==4 then figure.setColorTint({0,0.8,0,1}) end --scientist
      figure.setName("Enemy Bot - 1/3/1, 4 move")
      figure.setDescription("1/3/1, 4 move")
    end
    figure.setTable('hl', {0.9,0.9,0.9,1})
    figure.setVar('enemy','true')
    figure.highlightOn(figure.getVar('hl'))
    createHealthUI()
--  figure.highlightOn({1,1,1,1})
  end
  EnemyQty = TempE
end

end

  if MDb == 0 then EAth = 1 EPri = 2 ESec = 0 end

function EEquip()
  EquipA = ''
  EquipB = ''
  EquipC = ''
  EquipD = ''
  EAthb = EAth
  kit = 0
  gren = 0
--  if EAthb >= 1
    local a = math.random(6)
    local b = math.random(6)
    block2 = 0 + a + b
    --print('block2 = ' .. block2)
    if  block2 <= 2  then EquipA = "Sonic Beam" kit = kit+1 gren = gren+1 end
    if  block2 == 3  then EquipA = "Needler" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 4  then EquipA = "Slug Gun" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 5  then EquipA = "Ion Bore" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 6  then EquipA = "Disintegrator + Scope" end
    if  block2 == 7  then EquipA = "Blaster" kit = kit+1 gren = gren+1 end
    if  block2 == 8  then EquipA = "Laser" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 9  then EquipA = "Nerve Disruptor" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 10  then EquipA = "Particle Gun" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 11  then EquipA = "Voltrex" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 >= 12  then EquipA = "Plasma Pistol"  gren = gren+4 end
    if EAthb >=2 then
      print("ES = " .. ES)
      if EArmor == true then
        EAthb = EAthb-1
        EquipA = EquipA .. ", Armor"
      end
    end
    if EAthb >=3 and EHands >= 3 then
      EAthb = EAthb - 1
      EquipA = EquipA .. ", Shield"
    end
    if ES == 7 then EquipA = EquipA .." w/ Gun Butt, Jetpack" end

--  end
  if EAthb >= 2 then
    local a = math.random(6)
    local b = math.random(6)
    block2 = 0 + a + b
    --print('block2 = ' .. block2)
    if  block2 <= 2  then EquipB = "Knife, Stun Gun" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 3  then EquipB = "Sword"  gren = gren+3 end
    if  block2 == 4  then EquipB = "2x Flyntlock, EMP grenade" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 5  then EquipB = "VibraKnife" kit = kit+1 gren = gren+1 end
    if  block2 == 6  then EquipB = "Phase Pick" end
    if  block2 == 7  then EquipB = "Gun Butt" kit = kit+1 gren = gren+1 end
    if  block2 == 8  then EquipB = "Energy Blade"  gren = gren+2 end
    if  block2 == 9  then EquipB = "Plasma Dagger" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 == 10  then EquipB = "Arc Laser"  gren = gren+3 end
    if  block2 == 11  then EquipB = "EMP Pistol" kit = kit+1 end
    if  block2 >= 12  then EquipB = "Lightning Rod"  gren = gren+4 end
  end

    if EAthb >= 3 then
      local a = math.random(6)
      local b = math.random(6)
      block2 = 0 + a + b
      --print('block2 = ' .. block2)
      if  block2 <= 2  then EquipC = "Medjack, 1 of each drug" end
      if  block2 == 3  then EquipC = "Skeletal Enhancement, Slug Machine Gun" end
      if  block2 == 4  then EquipC = "Cyberfoot, Profession Chip" end
      if  block2 == 5  then EquipC = "Cybergyros" end
      if  block2 == 6  then EquipC = "Cyberhand, Profession Chip" end
      if  block2 == 7  then EquipC = "Autonurse, Profession Chip" gren = gren+2 end
      if  block2 == 8  then EquipC = "All Skill Chips, Magboots" end
      if  block2 == 9  then EquipC = "Cyberhook, Profession Chip" end
      if  block2 == 10  then EquipC = "Satchel Charge, Profession Chip"  kit = kit+1 end
      if  block2 == 11  then EquipC = "Skeletal Enhancement, Plasma Projector"  end
      if  block2 >= 12  then EquipC = "Gun Butt"  kit = kit+1 end
    end

    if EAthb >= 4 then
      kit = kit+2
    end

  --print(EquipA .. "\n" .. EquipB .. "\n" .. EquipC .. "\n" .. kit .. " kit, " .. gren .. "grenades")
end

function createHealthUI()
  if healthUI == true then

      local code_string = [[
      function updateSave()
          local data_to_save = {hp, hpmax, hpbarcolor, hl, enemy}
          saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
          self.script_state = saved_data
      end

      function onload(saved_data)
        if saved_data ~= "" then
          local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
          hp = loaded_data[1]
          hpmax = loaded_data[2]
          hpbarcolor = loaded_data[3]
          hl = loaded_data[4]
          enemy = loaded_data[5]
        end
        self.createButton({click_function = "barcolor", function_owner = self, label = hp .. "/" .. hpmax, position = {0, 1.5, 0}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 1000, height = 400, font_size = 300, color = {1,0,0,1}})
        self.createButton({click_function = "hpdn", function_owner = self, label = "-", position = {-0.7, 1.5, 0}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400})
        self.createButton({click_function = "hpup", function_owner = self, label = "+", position = {0.7, 1.5, 0}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400})
        colorBar()
        updateSave()
        self.sticky = false
      end

      function hpup(obj, color, alt)
        if alt == true then
          var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
          obj.setVar('hpmax', var+1)
          obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
        else
          var = obj.getVar('hp')
          obj.setVar('hp', var+1)
          obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
        end
        updateSave()
      end

      function hpdn(obj, color, alt)
        if alt == true then
          var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
          obj.setVar('hpmax', var-1)
          obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
        else
          var = obj.getVar('hp')
          obj.setVar('hp', var-1)
          obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
        end
        updateSave()
      end

      function colorBar()
        if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
        if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
          self.editButton({index=0, color = {1,0,0,1}})
        elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
          self.editButton({index=0, color = {0,1,0,1}})
        elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
          self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.2,0.2,0.8,1}})
        else
          self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.5,0.5,0.5,1}})
        end
        updateSave()
      end

      function barcolor(obj, color, alt)
        if alt == true then
          if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
          if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
            hpbarcolor = 'green'
            colorBar()
          elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
            hpbarcolor = 'blue'
            colorBar()
          elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
            hpbarcolor = 'grey'
            colorBar()
          else
            hpbarcolor = 'red'
            colorBar()
          end
        end
      end

      function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
        object = collision_info.collision_object
        if object.getVar('hea') ~= nil then
          hp = object.getVar('hea')
          hpmax = object.getVar('hea')
          self.editButton({index=0, label = (hp .. '/' .. hpmax)})
          updateSave()
        end
      end
      ]]
      figure.setLuaScript(code_string)
      --figure.reload()
      figure.setVar("hp", EAth + MD + EHP)
      figure.setVar("hpmax", EAth + MD + EHP)
      end
    end

local distance = 1

function onSave()
--print("starting onsave()")
  data_to_save={}
  if (mini~=nil) then
  --  print("mini~=nil")
    data_to_save={miniguid=mini.guid}
  --  print("data_to_save = ", data_to_save)
  end
--  print("encoding data...")
  saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
--  print("returnign saved data", saved_data)
  return saved_data
end


function onload(saved_data)
  if (saved_data~=nil) then
    loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
    if (loaded_data.miniguid ~= nil) then
      mini = getObjectFromGUID(loaded_data.miniguid)
    end
  end

  self.createButton({
       label="Sync", click_function="findByDistance",
       function_owner=self, position={0,0,0},
       height=410, width=410, font_size=70
   })

   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveE',    function_owner = self,    label = 'E',    position = {1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveW',    function_owner = self,    label = 'W',    position = {-1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveN',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {-0,0,-1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveS',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {-0,0,1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Fall',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {0.7,0,-0.3},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Stand',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {0.7,0,0.5},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
end

function Fall()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+(distance/2)})
     mini.setRotation({270, 0, 0})
     print(mini.guid)
end

function MoveE()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x+distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
 end


function MoveW()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x-distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
end

function MoveN()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+distance})
end

function MoveS()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-distance})
end

function Stand()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-(distance/3)})
     mini.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
print(obj)
print(highlight)
print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" or "Tileset" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          mini.setVar('hero', 'true')
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'), ", mini.hero = ", mini.getVar('hero'))
              else
                print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 5 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
--Overwrite all dice to be this color (table or false). Overrules diePlayerColor
dieColorOverwrite = false     --ex. {1,0,0} for red
--If a die is colored to match the player who pressed the button for it
diePlayerColor = true       --true or false

default_dice_qty = 2
MIN_VALUE = 0
MAX_VALUE = 21

--What type of die will be rolled by this tool (only works with 1)
dieType = "Die_6"
--Dice type options (quotes required)
--  Die_4
--  Die_6
--  Die_6_Rounded
--  Die_8
--  Die_10
--  Die_12
--  Die_20
--  Custom_Dice --REQUIRES ADDITIONAL ENTRIES BELOW

--If Custom_Dice is the dice type used, then you must enter info below
    --URL for the die image goes in the quotes
    dieImage = ""
    --Number of sides on die. Options are 4, 6, 8 10, 12, 20
    dieSides = 4

--Time before dice disappear. -1 means they do not (until next roll)
removalDelay = -1

--If dice are added together for announcement (true or false)
announce_total = true
--If individual results are displayed (true or false)
announce_each = true
--If last player to click button before roll happens gets their name announced
announce_player = true

--Distance dice are placed from the tool's center
radialOffset = 2.2
--Distance die gets moved up
heightOffset = 1
--Die size, default of 1
dieSize = 1

--How long to wait before rolling the spawned dice
waitBeforeRoll = 0.4

--How many dice can be spawned. 0 is infinite
dieLimit = 20

--END OF VARIABLES TO EDIT
--Beyond here, there be Lua!

--Save to track currently active dice for disposal on load
function onSave()
    if #currentDice > 0 then
        local currentDiceGUIDs = {}
        for _, obj in ipairs(currentDice) do
            if obj ~= nil then
                table.insert(currentDiceGUIDs, obj.getGUID())
            end
        end
        saved_data = JSON.encode(currentDiceGUIDs)
    else
        saved_data = ""
    end
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the save of any active dice and deletes them
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, guid in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then
                destroyObject(obj)
            end
        end
        currentDice = {}
    else
        currentDice = {}
    end

    --Makes the button
--    self.createButton({
--        click_function="click_execute", function_owner=self, label="Roll\n" .. default_dice_qty, font_size = 500,
--        position={-1.4,0.2,0}, height=1000, width=1000, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}
--    })

--    self.createButton({
--        click_function="Change_Num", function_owner=self, label="Qty Select", font_size = 200,
--        position={1.1,0.2,0.66}, height=500, width=1000, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}
--    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll1", function_owner=self, label="Roll 1", font_size = 150,
        position={-2,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll2", function_owner=self, label="Roll 2", font_size = 150,
        position={-0.66,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll3", function_owner=self, label="Roll 3", font_size = 150,
        position={0.66,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll4", function_owner=self, label="Roll 4", font_size = 150,
        position={2,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
end

function Change_Num(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(default_dice_qty  + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if new_value == MAX_VALUE then new_value = MIN_VALUE+1
    elseif new_value == MIN_VALUE then new_value = MAX_VALUE-1
    end
    if default_dice_qty ~= new_value then
        default_dice_qty = new_value
        self.editButton({index=0, label="Roll\n" .. default_dice_qty})
    end
end

--Die spawning and positioning

function click_execute(_, color)
  for i=1,default_dice_qty do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll1(_, color)
  for i=1,1 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll2(_, color)
  for i=1,2 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll3(_, color)
  for i=1,3 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll4(_, color)
  for i=1,4 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
--Click function, spawns new dice and waits for a pause to do the rolling
function click_roll(_, color)
    --Dice spam protection, can be disabled up at top of script
    local diceCount = 0
    for _ in pairs(currentDice) do
        diceCount = diceCount + 1
    end
    local denyRoll = false
    if dieLimit > 0 and diceCount >= dieLimit then
        denyRoll = true
    end
    --Check for if click is allowed
    if rollInProgress == nil and denyRoll == false then

        --Find dice positions, moving previously spawned dice if needed
        local angleStep = #currentDice+1
        for i, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            local pos = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(i)
            die.setPositionSmooth(pos, false, true)
        end

        --Spawns dice
        local spawnedDie = spawnObject({
            type=dieType,
            position = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angleStep),
            rotation = randomRotation(), scale={dieSize,dieSize,dieSize}
        })
        if dieType == "Custom_Dice" then
            spawnedDie.setCustomObject({
                image = dieImage,
                type = ref_customDieSides[tostring(dieSides)]
            })
        end
        table.insert(currentDice, spawnedDie)
        spawnedDie.setLock(true)
        if dieColorOverwrite ~= false then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(dieColorOverwrite)
        elseif diePlayerColor == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end

        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=waitBeforeRoll,
            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}
        })
    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end



--Die rolling



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end

--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        --Announcement
        if announce_total==true or announce_each==true then
            displayResults(color)
        end

        wait(0.1)
        rollInProgress = false

        --Auto die removal
        if removalDelay ~= -1 then
            --Timer starting
            Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
            Timer.create({
                identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
                function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
                delay=removalDelay,
            })
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end



--After roll broadcasting and cleanup



function displayResults(color)
    local total = 0
    local resultTable = {}

    --Tally result info
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            local value = die.getValue()
            total = total + value
            table.insert(resultTable, value)
        end
    end

    --Sort result table into order
    local sort_func = function(a,b) return a < b end
    table.sort(resultTable, sort_func)

    --String assembly
    local s = ""
    if announce_each == true then
        for i, v in ipairs(resultTable) do
            s = s .. v
            if i ~= #resultTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
    end
    if announce_total == true then
        if s ~= "" then
            s = s .. "     |     "
        end
        s = s .. "[b]" .. total .. "[/b]"
    end
    if announce_player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name .. "     |     " .. s
    end

    broadcastToAll(s, stringColorToRGB(color))
end



--Die cleanup



function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
    rollInProgress = nil
    currentDice = {}
end




--Utility functions to obtain info



--Finds a position, rotated around the Y axis, using distance you want + angle
--oPos is object pos, oRot=object rotation, distance = how far, angle = angle in degrees
function findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angle)
    local object, distance = self, radialOffset * self.getScale().x
    local oPos, oRot = object.getPosition(), object.getRotation()
  local posX = oPos.x -3.5 + 1.5*angle - (math.floor(angle/10))*15
  local posY = oPos.y + heightOffset
  local posZ = oPos.z + 1.5 * (math.ceil(angle/10))
  --else local posZ = oPos.z + 4

  return {x=posX, y=posY, z=posZ}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);
    --Return result
    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end




--Data tables



ref_customDieSides = {["4"]=0, ["6"]=1, ["8"]=2, ["10"]=3, ["12"]=4, ["20"]=5}

function INSERT_FUNCTION()
end

function spaceLegsToggle()
  if spacelegs == false then
    spacelegs = true
    self.editButton({index = 37, label = "Ignore OoC", color = {0,1,0,0.8}})
  else
    spacelegs = false
    self.editButton({index = 37, label = "Counting OoC", color = {1,0,0,0.8}})
  end
  updateAllLabels()
end

function updateDistance()
  originmini = origin.getVar('mini')
  targetmini = target.getVar('mini')
  self.editButton({index = 1, label = originmini.getName()})
  self.editButton({index = 2, label = targetmini.getName()})
  opos = originmini.getPosition()
  tpos = targetmini.getPosition()
  xdist = math.floor((math.abs(opos.x - tpos.x)/0.87)+0.3)
  ztemp = math.floor(math.abs(opos.z - tpos.z)+0.3)
  zdist = ztemp-math.floor(xdist/2)
--  print("oX= " .. opos.x .. "\nY= " .. opos.y .."\nZ= " .. opos.z)
--  print("tX= " .. tpos.x .. "\nY= " .. tpos.y .."\nZ= " .. tpos.z)
--  print("qX= " .. xdist .. "\nZ= " .. ztemp .. "\nadjusted Z= " .. zdist)
  if zdist >= 0 then
    dist = xdist + zdist
  else
    dist = xdist
  end
  self.editButton({index = 0, label = ("Distance " .. dist)})
  updateAllLabels()
end

function updateAllLabels()
  oooc = origin.getVar('ooc')
  if spacelegs == true then oooc = 0 end
  local calc = dist + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 4, label = calc}) --Fire noramal/multi cannon
  local calc = math.ceil(dist/2) + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 5, label = calc}) -- Fire laser cannon
  local calc = dist*3 + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 6, label = calc}) --Fire fusion cannon
  local calc = dist + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + (2*target.getVar('size')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 7, label = calc}) --Tractor ship 1 hex toward you
  local calc = dist + 12 + oooc --(2*target.getVar('speed')) + (2*target.getVar('size')) + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 8, label = calc}) --Tractor microship directly to your hex
  local calc = origin.getVar('size') + oooc + (3*cloakMult)
  self.editButton({index = 9, label = calc}) --Raise cloak X levels
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*engineMult)
  self.editButton({index = 11, label = calc}) --Pump for or transfer X power
  local calc = (dist*2) + oooc + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 14, label = calc}) --Fire a Fighter's Cannon
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*jetMult)
  self.editButton({index = 13, label = calc}) --Make X Jet moves with a Jetpac
  local calc = 0 + origin.getVar('size') + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 15, label = calc}) --Warp in (Successes/3) hexes closer
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*hyperMult)
  self.editButton({index = 16, label = calc}) --Program X warp tokens
  local calc = 0 + oooc + (3*pingMult)
  self.editButton({index = 18, label = calc}) --Ask X questions about nearby cloaked vessels
  local calc = (2*dist) + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 21, label = calc}) --Launch mine into empty hex
  local calc = math.ceil(dist/2) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak') + (3*scanMult)
  self.editButton({index = 22, label = calc}) --Acquire X scans on target
  local calc = dist + oooc + (3*ecmMult)
  self.editButton({index = 24, label = calc}) --Ask X yes/no questions about target OR ecm X missiles
  local calc = dist + oooc  + target.getVar('cloak') + (3*decloakMult)
  self.editButton({index = 26, label = calc}) --Reduce cloak of taret vessel by X levels (must verify hex location)
  local calc = 11 + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 28, label = calc}) --Launch a missile
  local calc = dist + oooc + (3*retargetMult)
  self.editButton({index = 29, label = calc}) --Retarget X missiles
  local calc = 0 + oooc + (3*medqMult)
  self.editButton({index = 31, label = calc}) --Ask X questions about anything in the MedBay
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*healMult)
  self.editButton({index = 33, label = calc}) --Heal X dice of damage from a character in the MedBay
  local calc = oooc
  self.editButton({index = 35, label = ('X+' .. calc)}) --Stabilize a dying (-6 health or less) character at -X health to -5 health
  local calc = dist + target.getVar('shields') + origin.getVar('shields') + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 36, label = calc})--Teleport a character or bomb to the target ship

end

function changeOrigin()
  countTargets()
  originA = originA+1
  if originA > count then  originA = 1 end
  origin = targetsTable[originA]
  updateDistance()
end

function changeTarget()
  countTargets()
  targetA = targetA+1
  if targetA > count then  targetA = 1 end
  target = targetsTable[targetA]
  updateDistance()
end

function countTargets()
  count = 0
  for _, object in ipairs(targetsTable) do
    count = count + 1
  end
end

function findPanels(obj, highlight, alt_click)
  print("[b]---Find Existence---[/b]")
  --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
  --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
  local allObjects = getAllObjects()
  local foundFigurine = false
  targetsTable = {}
  i = 0
  for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
    --object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
    if object.getVar('panelID') ~= nil then
      print(object.getName() .. " found.")
      print(object.getVar('panelID') .. " found.")
      --object.highlightOn({0,1,0,1})
      foundFigurine = true
      table.insert(targetsTable, object)
      i = i+1
    end
  end
  if foundFigurine == false or i < 2 then
    print("Not enough panels with IDs found")
  else
    originA = 1
    targetA = 2
    origin = targetsTable[originA]
    target = targetsTable[targetA]
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
    updateDistance()
  end
end


function altercloakMult(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(cloakMult + mod, 0), 4)
    if cloakMult ~= new_value then
        cloakMult = new_value
    end
    self.editButton({ index = 10, label = ("+" .. cloakMult +1 )})
    updateAllLabels()
end

ContainedObjects.LuaScript:
MIN_VALUE = -99
MAX_VALUE = 999

function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
  -- collision_info table:
  --   collision_object    Object
  --   contact_points      Table     {Vector, ...}
  --   relative_velocity   Vector
  object = collision_info.collision_object
  if object.getVar('luc') ~= nil then
    val = object.getVar('luc')
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
  end
end

function onload(saved_data)
    light_mode = false
    tooltip_show = true
    val = 0

    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        light_mode = loaded_data[1]
        val = loaded_data[2]
        tooltip_show = loaded_data[3]
    end

    createAll()
end

function updateSave()
    local data_to_save = {light_mode, val, tooltip_show}
    saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
    self.script_state = saved_data
end

function createAll()
    s_color = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5, 95}

    if light_mode then
        f_color = {1,1,1,95}
    else
        f_color = {0,0.6,0,100}
    end

    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.createButton({
      label=tostring(val),
      click_function="add_subtract",
      tooltip=ttText,
      function_owner=self,
      position={0,0.05,-0.4},
      height=600,
      width=600,
      alignment = 3,
      scale={x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
      font_size=800,
      font_color=f_color,
      color={0,0,0,0}
      })

    self.createInput({
        value = self.getName(),
        input_function = "editName",
        tooltip=ttText,
        label = "Counter",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position = {0,0.05,1.5},
        width = 1200,
        height = 1000,
        font_size = 300,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color= f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })


    if tooltip_show then
        tooltipShowText = "[ Hide value in tooltip ]"
    else
        tooltipShowText = "[ Show value in tooltip ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=tooltipShowText,
        tooltip=tooltipShowText,
        click_function="swap_tooltip",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.2},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    if light_mode then
        lightButtonText = "[ Set dark text ]"
    else
        lightButtonText = "[ Set light text ]"
    end
    self.createButton({
        label=lightButtonText,
        tooltip=lightButtonText,
        click_function="swap_fcolor",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,0.6},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=150,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=150,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })


    self.createButton({
        label="[ Reset ]",
        tooltip="[ Reset ]",
        click_function="reset_val",
        function_owner=self,
        position={0,-0.05,1.4},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        height=250,
        width=1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_size=250,
        font_color=s_color,
        color={0,0,0,0}
        })

    self.createInput({
        value = "#",
        label = "...",
        input_function = "keepSample",
        function_owner = self,
        alignment = 3,
        position={0,-0.05,-0.8},
        rotation={180,180,0},
        width = 600,
        height = 800,
        font_size = 1200,
        scale={x=1, y=1, z=1},
        font_color=f_color,
        color = {0,0,0,0}
        })

    setTooltips()
end

function removeAll()
    self.removeInput(0)
    self.removeInput(1)
    self.removeButton(0)
    self.removeButton(1)
    self.removeButton(2)
    self.removeButton(3)
end

function reloadAll()
    removeAll()
    createAll()
    setTooltips()
    updateSave()
end

function swap_fcolor(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    light_mode = not light_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_align(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    center_mode = not center_mode
    reloadAll()
end

function swap_tooltip(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    tooltip_show = not tooltip_show
    reloadAll()
    setTooltips()
end

function editName(_obj, _string, value)
    self.setName(value)
    setTooltips()
end

function add_subtract(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and 1 or -1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(val + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if val ~= new_value then
        val = new_value
        updateVal()
        updateSave()
    end
end

function updateVal()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        label = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function reset_val()
    val = 0
    updateVal()
    updateSave()
end

function setTooltips()
    if tooltip_show then
        ttText = "     " .. val .. "\n" .. self.getName()
    else
        ttText = self.getName()
    end

    self.editInput({
        index = 0,
        value = self.getName(),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
    self.editButton({
        index = 0,
        value = tostring(val),
        tooltip = ttText
        })
end

function null()
end

function keepSample(_obj, _string, value)
    reloadAll()
end

  subtitle = 'Titles'
  notes = 'Notes'
