function INSERT_FUNCTION()
end

function spaceLegsToggle()
  if spacelegs == false then
    spacelegs = true
    self.editButton({index = 37, label = "Ignore OoC", color = {0,1,0,0.8}})
  else
    spacelegs = false
    self.editButton({index = 37, label = "Counting OoC", color = {1,0,0,0.8}})
  end
  updateAllLabels()
end

function updateDistance()
  originmini = origin.getVar('mini')
  targetmini = target.getVar('mini')
  self.editButton({index = 1, label = originmini.getName()})
  self.editButton({index = 2, label = targetmini.getName()})
  opos = originmini.getPosition()
  tpos = targetmini.getPosition()
  xdist = math.floor((math.abs(opos.x - tpos.x)/0.87)+0.3)
  ztemp = math.floor(math.abs(opos.z - tpos.z)+0.3)
  zdist = ztemp-math.floor(xdist/2)
--  print("oX= " .. opos.x .. "\nY= " .. opos.y .."\nZ= " .. opos.z)
--  print("tX= " .. tpos.x .. "\nY= " .. tpos.y .."\nZ= " .. tpos.z)
--  print("qX= " .. xdist .. "\nZ= " .. ztemp .. "\nadjusted Z= " .. zdist)
  if zdist >= 0 then
    dist = xdist + zdist
  else
    dist = xdist
  end
  self.editButton({index = 0, label = ("Distance " .. dist)})
  updateAllLabels()
end

function updateAllLabels()
  oooc = origin.getVar('ooc')
  if spacelegs == true then oooc = 0 end
  local calc = dist + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 4, label = calc}) --Fire noramal/multi cannon
  local calc = math.ceil(dist/2) + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 5, label = calc}) -- Fire laser cannon
  local calc = dist*3 + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 6, label = calc}) --Fire fusion cannon
  local calc = dist + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + (2*target.getVar('size')) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 7, label = calc}) --Tractor ship 1 hex toward you
  local calc = dist + 12 + oooc --(2*target.getVar('speed')) + (2*target.getVar('size')) + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 8, label = calc}) --Tractor microship directly to your hex
  local calc = origin.getVar('size') + oooc + (3*cloakMult)
  self.editButton({index = 9, label = calc}) --Raise cloak X levels
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*engineMult)
  self.editButton({index = 11, label = calc}) --Pump for or transfer X power
  local calc = (dist*2) + oooc + (2*target.getVar('speed')) + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 14, label = calc}) --Fire a Fighter's Cannon
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*jetMult)
  self.editButton({index = 13, label = calc}) --Make X Jet moves with a Jetpac
  local calc = 0 + origin.getVar('size') + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 15, label = calc}) --Warp in (Successes/3) hexes closer
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*hyperMult)
  self.editButton({index = 16, label = calc}) --Program X warp tokens
  local calc = 0 + oooc + (3*pingMult)
  self.editButton({index = 18, label = calc}) --Ask X questions about nearby cloaked vessels
  local calc = (2*dist) + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 21, label = calc}) --Launch mine into empty hex
  local calc = math.ceil(dist/2) + oooc + target.getVar('cloak') + (3*scanMult)
  self.editButton({index = 22, label = calc}) --Acquire X scans on target
  local calc = dist + oooc + (3*ecmMult)
  self.editButton({index = 24, label = calc}) --Ask X yes/no questions about target OR ecm X missiles
  local calc = dist + oooc  + target.getVar('cloak') + (3*decloakMult)
  self.editButton({index = 26, label = calc}) --Reduce cloak of taret vessel by X levels (must verify hex location)
  local calc = 11 + oooc
  self.editButton({index = 28, label = calc}) --Launch a missile
  local calc = dist + oooc + (3*retargetMult)
  self.editButton({index = 29, label = calc}) --Retarget X missiles
  local calc = 0 + oooc + (3*medqMult)
  self.editButton({index = 31, label = calc}) --Ask X questions about anything in the MedBay
  local calc = 8 + oooc + (3*healMult)
  self.editButton({index = 33, label = calc}) --Heal X dice of damage from a character in the MedBay
  local calc = oooc
  self.editButton({index = 35, label = ('X+' .. calc)}) --Stabilize a dying (-6 health or less) character at -X health to -5 health
  local calc = dist + target.getVar('shields') + origin.getVar('shields') + oooc + target.getVar('cloak')
  self.editButton({index = 36, label = calc})--Teleport a character or bomb to the target ship

end

function changeOrigin()
  countTargets()
  originA = originA+1
  if originA > count then  originA = 1 end
  origin = targetsTable[originA]
  updateDistance()
end

function changeTarget()
  countTargets()
  targetA = targetA+1
  if targetA > count then  targetA = 1 end
  target = targetsTable[targetA]
  updateDistance()
end

function countTargets()
  count = 0
  for _, object in ipairs(targetsTable) do
    count = count + 1
  end
end

function findPanels(obj, highlight, alt_click)
  print("[b]---Find Existence---[/b]")
  --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
  --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
  local allObjects = getAllObjects()
  local foundFigurine = false
  targetsTable = {}
  i = 0
  for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
    --object.highlightOn({1,0,0,1})
    if object.getVar('panelID') ~= nil then
      print(object.getName() .. " found.")
      print(object.getVar('panelID') .. " found.")
      --object.highlightOn({0,1,0,1})
      foundFigurine = true
      table.insert(targetsTable, object)
      i = i+1
    end
  end
  if foundFigurine == false or i < 2 then
    print("Not enough panels with IDs found")
  else
    originA = 1
    targetA = 2
    origin = targetsTable[originA]
    target = targetsTable[targetA]
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
    updateDistance()
  end
end

    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(cloakMult + mod, 0), 4)

    end

    updateAllLabels()
end

function removeBars()
  local buttons = self.getButtons()
  -- iterate from end to front
  for k = #buttons, 1, -1 do
      -- stop when amount of buttons leq 8
      if #buttons <= 10 then
          break
      end
      -- remove the button and pop from the table
      self.removeButton(buttons[k].index)
      table.remove(buttons)
  end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
local distance = 1

function onSave()
--print("starting onsave()")
  data_to_save={}
  if (mini~=nil) then
  --  print("mini~=nil")
    data_to_save={miniguid=mini.guid}
  --  print("data_to_save = ", data_to_save)
  end
--  print("encoding data...")
  saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
--  print("returnign saved data", saved_data)
  return saved_data
end


function onload(saved_data)
  if (saved_data~=nil) then
    loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
    if (loaded_data.miniguid ~= nil) then
      mini = getObjectFromGUID(loaded_data.miniguid)
    end
  end

  self.createButton({
       label="Sync", click_function="findByDistance",
       function_owner=self, position={0,0,0},
       height=410, width=410, font_size=70
   })

   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveE',    function_owner = self,    label = 'E',    position = {1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveW',    function_owner = self,    label = 'W',    position = {-1.1,0,0},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveN',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {-0,0,-1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
   self.createButton({click_function = 'MoveS',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {-0,0,1.1},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 450,    height = 450,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Fall',    function_owner = self,    label = 'N',    position = {0.7,0,-0.3},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
--   self.createButton({click_function = 'Stand',    function_owner = self,    label = 'S',    position = {0.7,0,0.5},    rotation = {0,0,0},    width = 250,    height = 250,    font_size = 150})
end

function Fall()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+(distance/2)})
     mini.setRotation({270, 0, 0})
     print(mini.guid)
end

function MoveE()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x+distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
 end


function MoveW()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x-distance,pos.y+0.25,pos.z})
end

function MoveN()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z+distance})
end

function MoveS()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-distance})
end

function Stand()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()
--     local angle = mini.getRotation()
     mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.25,pos.z-(distance/3)})
     mini.setRotation({0, 0, 0})
end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
print(obj)
print(highlight)
print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" or "Tileset" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          mini.setVar('hero', 'true')
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'), ", mini.hero = ", mini.getVar('hero'))
              else
                print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 5 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

function reinitializecheck(_obj, _color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then
    self.editButton({index = 7, click_function = "intitest", label = "are you sure?", font_color = {1,0,0,100}})
  else
    print("panelID = " .. panelID)
  end
end

function intitest(_obj, _color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then
    reinitialize()
  end
  self.editButton({index = 7, click_function = "reinitializecheck", label = "clear data", font_color = {0,0,0,100}})
end

function none()
end

function editOther(_obj, _string, value)
  other = value
  self.editInput({index = 0, value = other})
end

function editpanelID(_obj, _string, value)
  panelID = value
  self.editInput({index = 1, value = panelID})

--  updateSave()
end
--=================
--hull data functions
--=================

function alterdisplay(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(display + mod, 0), 300)
    if display ~= new_value then
        display = new_value
    end
    self.editButton({ index = 2, label = tostring(display)})
    updateSave()
end

function alterhull(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(hull + mod, 0), 300)
    if hull ~= new_value then
        hull = new_value
    end
    self.editButton({ index = 0, label = tostring(hull)})
    alterhullcheck()
    updateSave()
end


function alterhullcheck()
  if hull >= 1 then baseHC = 1 end
  if hull >= 3 then baseHC = 2 end
  if hull >= 6 then baseHC = 3 end
  if hull >= 10 then baseHC = 4 end
  if hull >= 15 then baseHC = 5 end
  if hull >= 21 then baseHC = 6 end
  if hull >= 28 then baseHC = 7 end
  if hull >= 36 then baseHC = 8 end
  if hull >= 45 then baseHC = 9 end
  if hull >= 55 then baseHC = 10 end
  if hull >= 66 then baseHC = 11 end
  if hull >= 78 then baseHC = 12 end
  if hull >= 91 then baseHC = 13 end
  if hull >= 105 then baseHC = 14 end
  if hull >= 120 then baseHC = 15 end
  if hull >= 136 then baseHC = 16 end
  if hull >= 153 then baseHC = 17 end
  if hull >= 171 then baseHC = 18 end
  if hull >= 190 then baseHC = 19 end
  if hull >= 210 then baseHC = 20 end
  hullcheck = baseHC - size
  if hullcheck <= 2 then hullcheck = 0 end
  self.editButton({ index = 1, label = tostring(hullcheck)})
end



--==========
--flarble functions
--=========
function altermaneuver(_obj, _color, alt_click)
--print("ooc " .. ooc)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(maneuver + mod, -1), 8)
    if maneuver ~= new_value then
        maneuver = new_value
        --print("ooc " .. ooc)
    end
    if maneuver < 1 then
      if maneuver < 0 then
        self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "Steady the\nShip"})
      else
        self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "Simple\nManeuver"})
      end
    else
      self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "x" .. maneuver+1 .. " \nManeuver"})
    end
    updatePilotCheck()
end


function updatePilotCheck()
  if maneuver < 1 then
    if maneuver < 0 then
      self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed)})
      self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed))})
    else
      self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed .. "  ooc +" .. ooc)})
      self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed)+ooc)})
    end
  else
    self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed .. "  ooc +" .. ooc .." +" .. 3*maneuver)})
    self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed)+ooc+(3*maneuver))})
  end
end


function alterooc(_obj, _color, alt_click)
--print("ooc " .. ooc)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(ooc + mod, 0), 8)
    if ooc ~= new_value then
        ooc = new_value
        print(panelID .. " ooc = " .. ooc)
    end
    placeooc()
    updatePilotCheck()
    updateSave()
end

function placeooc()
  --print(oocToken)
  if oocToken == 'none' or oocToken == nil then
    pos = self.getPosition()
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'go_game_piece_white',
      position          = {pos.x-7.5, pos.y+0.5, pos.z+3.86},
      --rotation          = {0,180,0},
    --  scale             = {x=0.3, y=0.5, z=0.3},
    }
    oocToken = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      assetbundle = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/912416459773855101/45AF25F87E6A7F26DDF9198924F44AE91EC207B2/",
      type = 1,
      material = 1,
    }
    oocToken.setCustomObject(params)
    oocToken.setColorTint({0.2,0.2,0.6,1})
    oocToken.setLock(true)
  end
  panel = self.getPosition()
  oocToken.setPosition({panel.x-7.5+(spacing*ooc), panel.y+0.2, panel.z+3.86})
end


function alterspeed(_obj, _color, alt_click)
--print("speed " .. speed)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(speed + mod, 0), 8)
    if speed ~= new_value then
        speed = new_value
        print(panelID .. " speed = " .. speed)
    end
    placespeed()
    updatePilotCheck()
    updateSave()
end

function placespeed()
  --print(speedToken)
  if speedToken == 'none' or speedToken == nil  then
    pos = self.getPosition()
    spawnparams = {
      --type = 'Custom_Assetbundle',
      type = 'go_game_piece_white',

--=======================
--==Ship sync functions==
--=======================

function ShipturnR()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, angle.y+60, angle.z})
end

function ShipturnL()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, angle.y-60, angle.z})
end

function ShipturnRND()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  local rndangle = math.random(6)
  print('Random Rotation = ')
  print(rndangle)
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, rndangle*60, angle.z})
  mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.5,pos.z})
end

function Shipfwd()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()

    posX= math.sin(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    posZ= math.cos(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    mini.setPosition({pos.x-posX,pos.y+0.5,pos.z-posZ})
end

function Shipback()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()

    posX= math.sin(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    posZ= math.cos(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    mini.setPosition({pos.x+posX,pos.y+0.5,pos.z+posZ})
end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
--print(obj)
--print(highlight)
--print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                --print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          mini.setName(panelID)
                          self.setName(panelID)
                          --print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'))
              else
                --print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 3 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z-3)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

function SpawnMissile(_obj, color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then

    if mstype == 1 then self.editButton({index = 10, label = "Boarding\nMissile"}) end
    if mstype == 2 then self.editButton({index = 10, label = "Science\nProbe"}) end

    rnd = math.random(999)
    local pos = mini.getPosition()

    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Assetbundle',

      scale             = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},

    if mstype == 2 then params = {assetbundle = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142207285085692/9194747A273824365352C6C01FCC36A153474D60/", type = 1} objname = 'science probe' end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Token
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
--Overwrite all dice to be this color (table or false). Overrules diePlayerColor
dieColorOverwrite = false     --ex. {1,0,0} for red
--If a die is colored to match the player who pressed the button for it
diePlayerColor = true       --true or false

default_dice_qty = 2
MIN_VALUE = 0
MAX_VALUE = 21

--What type of die will be rolled by this tool (only works with 1)
dieType = "Die_6"
--Dice type options (quotes required)
--  Die_4
--  Die_6
--  Die_6_Rounded
--  Die_8
--  Die_10
--  Die_12
--  Die_20
--  Custom_Dice --REQUIRES ADDITIONAL ENTRIES BELOW

--If Custom_Dice is the dice type used, then you must enter info below
    --URL for the die image goes in the quotes
    dieImage = ""
    --Number of sides on die. Options are 4, 6, 8 10, 12, 20
    dieSides = 4

--Time before dice disappear. -1 means they do not (until next roll)
removalDelay = -1

--If dice are added together for announcement (true or false)
announce_total = true
--If individual results are displayed (true or false)
announce_each = true
--If last player to click button before roll happens gets their name announced
announce_player = true

--Distance dice are placed from the tool's center
radialOffset = 2.2
--Distance die gets moved up
heightOffset = 1
--Die size, default of 1
dieSize = 1

--How long to wait before rolling the spawned dice
waitBeforeRoll = 0.4

--How many dice can be spawned. 0 is infinite
dieLimit = 20

--END OF VARIABLES TO EDIT
--Beyond here, there be Lua!

--Save to track currently active dice for disposal on load
function onSave()
    if #currentDice > 0 then
        local currentDiceGUIDs = {}
        for _, obj in ipairs(currentDice) do
            if obj ~= nil then
                table.insert(currentDiceGUIDs, obj.getGUID())
            end
        end
        saved_data = JSON.encode(currentDiceGUIDs)
    else
        saved_data = ""
    end
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the save of any active dice and deletes them
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, guid in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then
                destroyObject(obj)
            end
        end
        currentDice = {}
    else
        currentDice = {}
    end

    --Makes the button
--    self.createButton({
--        click_function="click_execute", function_owner=self, label="Roll\n" .. default_dice_qty, font_size = 500,
--        position={-1.4,0.2,0}, height=1000, width=1000, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}
--    })

--    self.createButton({
--        click_function="Change_Num", function_owner=self, label="Qty Select", font_size = 200,
--        position={1.1,0.2,0.66}, height=500, width=1000, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}
--    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll1", function_owner=self, label="Roll 1", font_size = 150,
        position={-2,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll2", function_owner=self, label="Roll 2", font_size = 150,
        position={-0.66,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll3", function_owner=self, label="Roll 3", font_size = 150,
        position={0.66,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll4", function_owner=self, label="Roll 4", font_size = 150,
        position={2,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
end

function Change_Num(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(default_dice_qty  + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if new_value == MAX_VALUE then new_value = MIN_VALUE+1
    elseif new_value == MIN_VALUE then new_value = MAX_VALUE-1
    end
    if default_dice_qty ~= new_value then
        default_dice_qty = new_value
        self.editButton({index=0, label="Roll\n" .. default_dice_qty})
    end
end

--Die spawning and positioning

function click_execute(_, color)
  for i=1,default_dice_qty do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll1(_, color)
  for i=1,1 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll2(_, color)
  for i=1,2 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll3(_, color)
  for i=1,3 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
function roll4(_, color)
  for i=1,4 do
    click_roll(_, color)
  end
end
--Click function, spawns new dice and waits for a pause to do the rolling
function click_roll(_, color)
    --Dice spam protection, can be disabled up at top of script
    local diceCount = 0
    for _ in pairs(currentDice) do
        diceCount = diceCount + 1
    end
    local denyRoll = false
    if dieLimit > 0 and diceCount >= dieLimit then
        denyRoll = true
    end
    --Check for if click is allowed
    if rollInProgress == nil and denyRoll == false then

        --Find dice positions, moving previously spawned dice if needed
        local angleStep = #currentDice+1
        for i, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            local pos = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(i)
            die.setPositionSmooth(pos, false, true)
        end

        --Spawns dice
        local spawnedDie = spawnObject({
            type=dieType,
            position = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angleStep),
            rotation = randomRotation(), scale={dieSize,dieSize,dieSize}
        })
        if dieType == "Custom_Dice" then
            spawnedDie.setCustomObject({
                image = dieImage,
                type = ref_customDieSides[tostring(dieSides)]
            })
        end
        table.insert(currentDice, spawnedDie)
        spawnedDie.setLock(true)
        if dieColorOverwrite ~= false then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(dieColorOverwrite)
        elseif diePlayerColor == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end

        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=waitBeforeRoll,
            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}
        })
    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end



--Die rolling



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end

--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        --Announcement
        if announce_total==true or announce_each==true then
            displayResults(color)
        end

        wait(0.1)
        rollInProgress = false

        --Auto die removal
        if removalDelay ~= -1 then
            --Timer starting
            Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
            Timer.create({
                identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
                function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
                delay=removalDelay,
            })
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end



--After roll broadcasting and cleanup



function displayResults(color)
    local total = 0
    local resultTable = {}

    --Tally result info
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            local value = die.getValue()
            total = total + value
            table.insert(resultTable, value)
        end
    end

    --Sort result table into order
    local sort_func = function(a,b) return a < b end
    table.sort(resultTable, sort_func)

    --String assembly
    local s = ""
    if announce_each == true then
        for i, v in ipairs(resultTable) do
            s = s .. v
            if i ~= #resultTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
    end
    if announce_total == true then
        if s ~= "" then
            s = s .. "     |     "
        end
        s = s .. "[b]" .. total .. "[/b]"
    end
    if announce_player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name .. "     |     " .. s
    end

    broadcastToAll(s, stringColorToRGB(color))
end



--Die cleanup



function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
    rollInProgress = nil
    currentDice = {}
end




--Utility functions to obtain info



--Finds a position, rotated around the Y axis, using distance you want + angle
--oPos is object pos, oRot=object rotation, distance = how far, angle = angle in degrees
function findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angle)
    local object, distance = self, radialOffset * self.getScale().x
    local oPos, oRot = object.getPosition(), object.getRotation()
  local posX = oPos.x -3.5 + 1.5*angle - (math.floor(angle/10))*15
  local posY = oPos.y + heightOffset
  local posZ = oPos.z + 1.5 * (math.ceil(angle/10))
  --else local posZ = oPos.z + 4

  return {x=posX, y=posY, z=posZ}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);
    --Return result
    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end




--Data tables



ref_customDieSides = {["4"]=0, ["6"]=1, ["8"]=2, ["10"]=3, ["12"]=4, ["20"]=5}

--Save to track currently active dice for disposal on load
function onSave()
    if #currentDice > 0 then
        local currentDiceGUIDs = {}
        for _, obj in ipairs(currentDice) do
            if obj ~= nil then
                table.insert(currentDiceGUIDs, obj.getGUID())
            end
        end
        saved_data = JSON.encode(currentDiceGUIDs)
    else
        saved_data = ""
    end
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the save of any active dice and deletes them
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, guid in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then
                destroyObject(obj)
            end
        end
        currentDice = {}
    else
        currentDice = {}

    })
end

function Change_Num(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(default_dice_qty  + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if new_value == MAX_VALUE then new_value = MIN_VALUE+1
    elseif new_value == MIN_VALUE then new_value = MAX_VALUE-1
    end
    if default_dice_qty ~= new_value then

        --Timer starting

            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}

    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()

    else

            spawnedDie.setCustomObject({
                image = dieImage,

        if dieColorOverwrite ~= false then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(dieColorOverwrite)
        elseif diePlayerColor == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end

        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=waitBeforeRoll,
            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}
        })
    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end



--Die rolling



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end

--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        --Announcement
        if announce_total==true or announce_each==true then
            displayResults(color)
        end

        wait(0.1)
        rollInProgress = false

        --Auto die removal
        if removalDelay ~= -1 then
            --Timer starting
            Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
            Timer.create({
                identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
                function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
                delay=removalDelay,
            })
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end



--After roll broadcasting and cleanup



function displayResults(color)
    local total = 0
    local resultTable = {}

    --Tally result info
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            local value = die.getValue()
            total = total + value
            table.insert(resultTable, value)
        end
    end

    --Sort result table into order
    local sort_func = function(a,b) return a < b end
    table.sort(resultTable, sort_func)

    --String assembly
    local s = ""
    if announce_each == true then
        for i, v in ipairs(resultTable) do
            s = s .. v
            if i ~= #resultTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
    end
    if announce_total == true then
        if s ~= "" then
            s = s .. "     |     "
        end
        s = s .. "[b]" .. total .. "[/b]"
    end
    if announce_player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name .. "     |     " .. s
    end

    broadcastToAll(s, stringColorToRGB(color))
end



--Die cleanup



function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
    rollInProgress = nil
    currentDice = {}
end




--Utility functions to obtain info



--Finds a position, rotated around the Y axis, using distance you want + angle
--oPos is object pos, oRot=object rotation, distance = how far, angle = angle in degrees
function findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angle)
    local object, distance = self, radialOffset * self.getScale().x
    local oPos, oRot = object.getPosition(), object.getRotation()
  local posX = oPos.x -3.5 + 1.5*angle - (math.floor(angle/10))*15
  local posY = oPos.y + heightOffset
  local posZ = oPos.z + 1.5 * (math.ceil(angle/10))
  --else local posZ = oPos.z + 4

  return {x=posX, y=posY, z=posZ}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);
    --Return result
    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end

ref_customDieSides = {["4"]=0, ["6"]=1, ["8"]=2, ["10"]=3, ["12"]=4, ["20"]=5}

    dieSides = 4

removalDelay = -1

announce_total = true
--If individual results are displayed (true or false)
announce_each = true
--If last player to click button before roll happens gets their name announced
announce_player = true

--Distance dice are placed from the tool's center
radialOffset = 2.2

heightOffset = 1

waitBeforeRoll = 0.4

--How many dice can be spawned. 0 is infinite
dieLimit = 20

--Save to track currently active dice for disposal on load
function onSave()
    if #currentDice > 0 then
        local currentDiceGUIDs = {}
        for _, obj in ipairs(currentDice) do
            if obj ~= nil then
                table.insert(currentDiceGUIDs, obj.getGUID())
            end
        end
        saved_data = JSON.encode(currentDiceGUIDs)
    else
        saved_data = ""
    end
    return saved_data
end

function onload(saved_data)
    --Loads the save of any active dice and deletes them
    if saved_data ~= "" then
        local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
        for _, guid in ipairs(loaded_data) do
            local obj = getObjectFromGUID(guid)
            if obj ~= nil then
                destroyObject(obj)
            end
        end
        currentDice = {}
    else
        currentDice = {}
    end

    --Makes the button

    self.createButton({

    })
    self.createButton({

    })
    self.createButton({

        position={0.66,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
    self.createButton({
        click_function="roll4", function_owner=self, label="Roll 4", font_size = 150,
        position={2,0.2,0}, height=400, width=500, color={0.7,0.7,0.7,1}, font_color={0,0,0,1}, scale={1,1,2}
    })
end

function Change_Num(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(default_dice_qty  + mod, MIN_VALUE), MAX_VALUE)
    if new_value == MAX_VALUE then new_value = MIN_VALUE+1
    elseif new_value == MIN_VALUE then new_value = MAX_VALUE-1
    end
    if default_dice_qty ~= new_value then
        default_dice_qty = new_value
        self.editButton({index=0, label="Roll\n" .. default_dice_qty})
    end
end

--Click function, spawns new dice and waits for a pause to do the rolling
function click_roll(_, color)
    --Dice spam protection, can be disabled up at top of script
    local diceCount = 0
    for _ in pairs(currentDice) do
        diceCount = diceCount + 1
    end
    local denyRoll = false
    if dieLimit > 0 and diceCount >= dieLimit then
        denyRoll = true
    end
    --Check for if click is allowed
    if rollInProgress == nil and denyRoll == false then

        --Find dice positions, moving previously spawned dice if needed
        local angleStep = #currentDice+1
        for i, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            local pos = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(i)
            die.setPositionSmooth(pos, false, true)
        end

        --Spawns dice
        local spawnedDie = spawnObject({
            type=dieType,
            position = findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angleStep),
            rotation = randomRotation(), scale={dieSize,dieSize,dieSize}
        })
        if dieType == "Custom_Dice" then
            spawnedDie.setCustomObject({
                image = dieImage,
                type = ref_customDieSides[tostring(dieSides)]
            })
        end
        table.insert(currentDice, spawnedDie)
        spawnedDie.setLock(true)
        if dieColorOverwrite ~= false then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(dieColorOverwrite)
        elseif diePlayerColor == true then
            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end

        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=waitBeforeRoll,
            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}
        })
    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end

            spawnedDie.setColorTint(stringColorToRGB(color))
        end

        --Timer starting
        Timer.destroy("clickRoller_"..self.getGUID())
        Timer.create({
            identifier="clickRoller_"..self.getGUID(), delay=waitBeforeRoll,
            function_name="rollDice", function_owner=self,
            parameters = {color = color}
        })
    elseif rollInProgress == false then
        cleanupDice()
        click_roll(_, color)
    else
        Player[color].broadcast("Roll in progress.", {0.8, 0.2, 0.2})
    end
end



--Die rolling



--Rolls all the dice and then launches monitoring
function rollDice(p)
    rollInProgress = true
    function coroutine_rollDice()
        for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
            die.setLock(false)
            die.randomize()
            wait(0.1)
        end

        monitorDice(p.color)

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_rollDice")
end

--Monitors dice to come to rest
function monitorDice(color)
    function coroutine_monitorDice()
        repeat
            local allRest = true
            for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
                if die ~= nil and die.resting == false then
                    allRest = false
                end
            end
            coroutine.yield(0)
        until allRest == true

        --Announcement
        if announce_total==true or announce_each==true then
            displayResults(color)
        end

        wait(0.1)
        rollInProgress = false

        --Auto die removal
        if removalDelay ~= -1 then
            --Timer starting
            Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
            Timer.create({
                identifier="clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID(),
                function_name="cleanupDice", function_owner=self,
                delay=removalDelay,
            })
        end

        return 1
    end
    startLuaCoroutine(self, "coroutine_monitorDice")
end



--After roll broadcasting and cleanup



function displayResults(color)
    local total = 0
    local resultTable = {}

    --Tally result info
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            local value = die.getValue()
            total = total + value
            table.insert(resultTable, value)
        end
    end

    --Sort result table into order
    local sort_func = function(a,b) return a < b end
    table.sort(resultTable, sort_func)

    --String assembly
    local s = ""
    if announce_each == true then
        for i, v in ipairs(resultTable) do
            s = s .. v
            if i ~= #resultTable then
                s = s .. ", "
            end
        end
    end
    if announce_total == true then
        if s ~= "" then
            s = s .. "     |     "
        end
        s = s .. "[b]" .. total .. "[/b]"
    end
    if announce_player == true then
        s = Player[color].steam_name .. "     |     " .. s
    end

    broadcastToAll(s, stringColorToRGB(color))
end



--Die cleanup



function cleanupDice()
    for _, die in ipairs(currentDice) do
        if die ~= nil then
            destroyObject(die)
        end
    end

    Timer.destroy("clickRoller_cleanup_"..self.getGUID())
    rollInProgress = nil
    currentDice = {}
end




--Utility functions to obtain info



--Finds a position, rotated around the Y axis, using distance you want + angle
--oPos is object pos, oRot=object rotation, distance = how far, angle = angle in degrees
function findGlobalPosWithLocalDirection(angle)
    local object, distance = self, radialOffset * self.getScale().x
    local oPos, oRot = object.getPosition(), object.getRotation()
  local posX = oPos.x -4.5 + 1.5*angle - (math.floor(angle/10))*15
  local posY = oPos.y + heightOffset
  local posZ = oPos.z + 2.5 * (math.ceil(angle/10))
  --else local posZ = oPos.z + 4

  return {x=posX, y=posY, z=posZ}
end

--Gets a random rotation vector
function randomRotation()
    --Credit for this function goes to Revinor (forums)
    --Get 3 random numbers
    local u1 = math.random();
    local u2 = math.random();
    local u3 = math.random();
    --Convert them into quats to avoid gimbal lock
    local u1sqrt = math.sqrt(u1);
    local u1m1sqrt = math.sqrt(1-u1);
    local qx = u1m1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qy = u1m1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u2);
    local qz = u1sqrt *math.sin(2*math.pi*u3);
    local qw = u1sqrt *math.cos(2*math.pi*u3);
    --Apply rotation
    local ysqr = qy * qy;
    local t0 = -2.0 * (ysqr + qz * qz) + 1.0;
    local t1 = 2.0 * (qx * qy - qw * qz);
    local t2 = -2.0 * (qx * qz + qw * qy);
    local t3 = 2.0 * (qy * qz - qw * qx);
    local t4 = -2.0 * (qx * qx + ysqr) + 1.0;
    --Correct
    if t2 > 1.0 then t2 = 1.0 end
    if t2 < -1.0 then ts = -1.0 end
    --Convert back to X/Y/Z
    local xr = math.asin(t2);
    local yr = math.atan2(t3, t4);
    local zr = math.atan2(t1, t0);
    --Return result
    return {math.deg(xr),math.deg(yr),math.deg(zr)}
end

--Coroutine delay, in seconds
function wait(time)
    local start = os.time()
    repeat coroutine.yield(0) until os.time() > start + time
end




--Data tables

function Fall()
     local pos = mini.getPosition()

end

function Stand()

--     local angle = mini.getRotation()

end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
print(obj)
print(highlight)
print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" or "Tileset" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          mini.setVar('hero', 'true')
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'), ", mini.hero = ", mini.getVar('hero'))
              else
                print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 5 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

--=================
--hull data functions
--=================

function alterdisplay(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(display + mod, 0), 300)
    if display ~= new_value then
        display = new_value
    end
    self.editButton({ index = 2, label = tostring(display)})
    updateSave()
end

function alterhull(_obj, _color, alt_click)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(hull + mod, 0), 300)
    if hull ~= new_value then
        hull = new_value
    end
    self.editButton({ index = 0, label = tostring(hull)})
    alterhullcheck()
    updateSave()
end


function alterhullcheck()
  if hull >= 1 then baseHC = 1 end
  if hull >= 3 then baseHC = 2 end
  if hull >= 6 then baseHC = 3 end
  if hull >= 10 then baseHC = 4 end
  if hull >= 15 then baseHC = 5 end
  if hull >= 21 then baseHC = 6 end
  if hull >= 28 then baseHC = 7 end
  if hull >= 36 then baseHC = 8 end
  if hull >= 45 then baseHC = 9 end
  if hull >= 55 then baseHC = 10 end
  if hull >= 66 then baseHC = 11 end
  if hull >= 78 then baseHC = 12 end
  if hull >= 91 then baseHC = 13 end
  if hull >= 105 then baseHC = 14 end
  if hull >= 120 then baseHC = 15 end
  if hull >= 136 then baseHC = 16 end
  if hull >= 153 then baseHC = 17 end
  if hull >= 171 then baseHC = 18 end
  if hull >= 190 then baseHC = 19 end
  if hull >= 210 then baseHC = 20 end
  hullcheck = baseHC - size
  if hullcheck <= 2 then hullcheck = 0 end
  self.editButton({ index = 1, label = tostring(hullcheck)})
end



--==========
--flarble functions
--=========
function altermaneuver(_obj, _color, alt_click)
--print("ooc " .. ooc)
    mod = alt_click and -1 or 1
    new_value = math.min(math.max(maneuver + mod, -1), 8)
    if maneuver ~= new_value then
        maneuver = new_value
        --print("ooc " .. ooc)
    end
    if maneuver < 1 then
      if maneuver < 0 then
        self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "Steady the\nShip"})
      else
        self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "Simple\nManeuver"})
      end
    else
      self.editButton({ index = 8, label = "x" .. maneuver+1 .. " \nManeuver"})
    end
    updatePilotCheck()
end


function updatePilotCheck()
  if maneuver < 1 then
    if maneuver < 0 then
      self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed)})
      self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed))})
    else
      self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed .. "  ooc +" .. ooc)})
      self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed)+ooc)})
    end
  else
    self.editButton({ index = 5, label = ("size +" .. 2*size .. "  speed +" .. 2*speed .. "  ooc +" .. ooc .." +" .. 3*maneuver)})
    self.editButton({ index = 6, label = ((2*size)+(2*speed)+ooc+(3*maneuver))})
  end
end

--=======================
--==Ship sync functions==
--=======================

function ShipturnR()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, angle.y+60, angle.z})
end

function ShipturnL()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, angle.y-60, angle.z})
end

function ShipturnRND()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
  local angle = mini.getRotation()
  local rndangle = math.random(6)
  print('Random Rotation = ')
  print(rndangle)
  mini.setRotation({angle.x, rndangle*60, angle.z})
  mini.setPosition({pos.x,pos.y+0.5,pos.z})
end

function Shipfwd()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()

    posX= math.sin(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    posZ= math.cos(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    mini.setPosition({pos.x-posX,pos.y+0.5,pos.z-posZ})
end

function Shipback()
  local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()

    posX= math.sin(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    posZ= math.cos(math.rad(angle.y))*distance
    mini.setPosition({pos.x+posX,pos.y+0.5,pos.z+posZ})
end

function findByDistance(obj, highlight, alt_click)
--print(obj)
--print(highlight)
--print(alt_click)
    print("[b]---Find By Distance---[/b]")
    --This is very similar to how we did findByTag()
    --We are also using tag to narrow it down, which isn't strictly necessary
    local allObjects = getAllObjects()
    local foundFigurine = false
    for _, object in ipairs(allObjects) do
       if object.tag == "Figurine" then
            local distance = findProximity(self.getPosition(), object)
            --Here is the check for distance
            if distance <= 3 then
                print(object.getName() .. " found.")
--                print(object.tag .. " object tag.")
              if object.guid ~= self.guid then
                mini = getObjectFromGUID(object.guid)
                --print(mini.guid .. " mini.guid.")
                local color = self.getColorTint()
                mini.setColorTint(color)
                          mini.setVar('hl', highlight)
                          --hlcolor = mini.getVar('hl')
                          mini.highlightOn(mini.getVar('hl'))
                          mini.setName(panelID)
                          self.setName(panelID)
                          --print("mini.hl = ", mini.getVar('hl'))
              else
                --print("self found")
              end
--                print(mini.guid .. " = current mini control.")
--function onPickedUp()
--print(color.r, color.g, color.b)
--stringColorToRGB(color)
--
                foundFigurine = true
            end
        end
    end
    if foundFigurine == false then
        print("No figurines found within 3 units.")
    end
    print("[b]-------------------------[/b]")
end

--Used by findByDistance
function findProximity(targetPos, object)
    local objectPos = object.getPosition()
    local xDistance = math.abs(targetPos.x - objectPos.x)
    local zDistance = math.abs(targetPos.z - objectPos.z-3)
    local distance = xDistance^2 + zDistance^2
    return math.sqrt(distance)
end

--==========
--Spawning buttons
--==========


function SpawnMissile(_obj, color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then
    if mstype == nil then mstype = 0 end
    mstype = mstype + 1
    if mstype > 2 then mstype = 0 end
    if mstype == 0 then self.editButton({index = 10, label = "Warhead\nMissile"}) end
    if mstype == 1 then self.editButton({index = 10, label = "Boarding\nMissile"}) end
    if mstype == 2 then self.editButton({index = 10, label = "Science\nProbe"}) end
  end
  if alt_click == false then
    rnd = math.random(999)
    local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()
    --print(pos, angle)
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Assetbundle',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {angle.x, angle.y, angle.z},
      scale             = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
    }
    missile = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      assetbundle = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142207285086851/AF4B7AA106CF998E7A160D3BF305CCC3347856CA/",
      type = 1,
      material = 0,
      --callback_function = function(obj) spawn_callback(obj, "Red") end
    }
    objname = 'warhead'
    if mstype == 1 then params = {assetbundle = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142207285083228/54E10A648EF804D66E04CB3FCCFC87430996DAE9/", type = 1} objname = 'boarding missile' end
    if mstype == 2 then params = {assetbundle = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142207285085692/9194747A273824365352C6C01FCC36A153474D60/", type = 1} objname = 'science probe' end
    missile.setCustomObject(params)
    missile.setName(panelID .. "'s " .. objname .. ' ' .. rnd)

    if mstype == 1 then
      posb = self.getPosition()
      clone_parameters = {position = {posb.x,pos.y+1,posb.z-2.5, snap_to_grid = true}}
      card = getObjectFromGUID('5a2122')
      object = card.clone(clone_parameters)
      object.setLock(false)
      object.setName(panelID .. "'s " .. objname .. ' ' .. rnd)
      object.setVar('mini' ,  missile)
    end
    missile.setVar('ooc', 0)
    missile.setVar('microdamage' , 0)
    missile.setVar('speed' , 6)
    missile.setVar('size' , 0)
    missile.setVar('helm' , 0)
    missile.setVar('guns' , 0)
    missile.setVar('shields' , 0)
    missile.setVar('cloak' , 0)
    missile.setVar('mini' ,  missile)
    missile.setVar('panelID' , missile.getName())
  end
end


function SpawnMine(_obj, color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then
    if mntype == nil then mntype = 0 end
    mntype = mntype + 1
    if mntype > 9 then mntype = 0 end
    if mntype == 0 then mnname = "Mine" end
    if mntype == 1 then mnname = "Gas Mine" end
    if mntype == 2 then mnname = "Chaff" end
    if mntype == 3 then mnname = "Plasma Mine" end
    if mntype == 4 then mnname = "Seeker Mine" end
    if mntype == 5 then mnname = "OoC Mine" end
    if mntype == 6 then mnname = "Anchor Mine" end
    if mntype == 7 then mnname = "Probe Mine" end
    if mntype == 8 then mnname = "Heavy Mine" end
    if mntype == 9 then mnname = "Burst Mine" end
    self.editButton({index = 11, label = mnname})
  end
  if alt_click == false then
    if mnname == nil then mnname = "mine" end
    local pos = mini.getPosition()
    local angle = mini.getRotation()
    rnd = math.random(999)
    --print(pos, angle)
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Model',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,180,0},
      scale             = {x=1.5, y=1.5, z=1.5},
    }
    mine = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771069915424703/6CA08E37CDACE1EF17888D179C17D304292723DA/",
      collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/967616059748912163/706F2DCB160DFCD455616DA015F4253AFF341A95/",
      type = 1,
      material = 0,
    }
    mine.setCustomObject(params)
    mine.setColorTint(mini.getColorTint())
    mine.setName(panelID .. "'s " .. mnname .. ' ' .. rnd)
    mine.setVar('mini' ,  mine)
    mine.setVar('panelID' , mine.getName())
  end
end


function SpawnFighter(_obj, color, alt_click)
  if alt_click == true then
    if ftrtype == nil then ftrtype = 0 end
    ftrtype = ftrtype + 1
    if ftrtype > 1 then ftrtype = 0 end
    if ftrtype == 0 then self.editButton({index = 9, label = "Drone"}) end
    if ftrtype == 1 then self.editButton({index = 9, label = "Fighter"}) end
  end

  if alt_click == false then
    local pos = mini.getPosition()
    spawnparams = {
      type = 'Custom_Model',
      position          = {pos.x,pos.y+2,pos.z},
      rotation          = {0,0,0},
      scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
    }
    fighter = spawnObject(spawnparams)
    params = {
      mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771069904331659/5966B9333DB1B23272F7F5C736C23ED144D7F8A5/",
      collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/967616059748912163/706F2DCB160DFCD455616DA015F4253AFF341A95/",
      type = 1,
      material = 0,
    }
    fighter.setCustomObject(params)
    fighter.setName(panelID .. "'s " .. color .. " Fighter")
    if ftrtype == 0 then fighter.setName(panelID .. "'s " .. color .. " Drone") end
    fighter.setColorTint(color)
    fighter.setVar('hl', color)
    fighter.setVar('mini', fighter)
    fighter.setVar('ooc', 0)
    fighter.setVar('microdamage' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('speed' , 6)
    fighter.setVar('size' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('helm' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('guns' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('shields' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('cloak' , 0)
    fighter.setVar('mini' ,  fighter)
    fighter.setVar('panelID' , fighter.getName())

    if ftrtype == 1 then --also spawn boarding plate
      pos = self.getPosition()
      spawnparams = {
        type = 'Custom_Model',
        position          = {pos.x,pos.y+1,pos.z-3},
        rotation          = {0,0,0},
        scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
      }
      object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
      params = {
        mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626227161937/13F42031E6CCA3FE91FB6A8CFA54DD33F017E401/",
        collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626231792427/5E5B132190A889D837621DB1909D9EF60C03C671/",
        diffuse = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626227195157/2A7A5C0E5AC5E5A16406F39990AD56BB897B22D6/",
        type = 1,
        material = 3,
      }
      object.setCustomObject(params)
      object.setName(fighter.getName())
      object.setColorTint(color)
      object.setVar('hl', color)
      --object.setVar('panelID' , fighter.getName())
    end
  end
end

ObjectStates.Name: Custom_Tile
ObjectStates.LuaScript:
page = 3
maxpage = 9
function onload()
self.createButton({click_function = "index", index = 0, function_owner = self, label = page, position = {0.25, 0.2, 0.85}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 0, height = 0, font_size = 250, font_color={1,1,1,1}, tooltip = "Page"})
self.createButton({click_function = "pagedn", index = 1, function_owner = self, label = "1", position = {0.75, 0.1, 0.75}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400, color = {0,0,0,0}, tooltip = "Prev"})
self.createButton({click_function = "pageup", index = 2, function_owner = self, label = "2", position = {1.25, 0.1, 0.75}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 400, height = 400, font_size = 400, color = {0,0,0,0}, tooltip = "Next"})
createPage()
end

function pagedn() self.setState(page-1) end
function pageup() self.setState(page+1) end
--function pageup()  page=page+1  if page > maxpage then page = 1 end print("Replicator page " .. page)  self.editButton({index=0, label=page}) changepage() end
--function pagedn()  page=page-1  if page < 1 then page = maxpage end print("Replicator page " .. page)  self.editButton({index=0, label=page}) changepage() end

--function deletePage()
--end

function createPage()

function spawn1(obj, color, alt_click) --starbse
  pos = self.getPosition()
  spawnparams = {
    type = 'Custom_Model',
    position          = {pos.x-3,pos.y+1,pos.z},
    rotation          = {0,180,0},
    scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
  }
  object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
  params = {
    mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142207287772796/E0B7C51A832C70EB1CE9236C8C1DC59564C3FEE6/",
    collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771069904729738/7DA3CB6C60314503CD770E4EE2D8D17FFE4E9495/",
    type = 1,
    material = 3,
  }
  object.setCustomObject(params)
  object.setName("Starbase")
  object.setColorTint(color)
  object.setVar('hl', color)
  object.setVar('ship', true)
end



function spawn2(obj, color, alt_click) --planet
  pos = self.getPosition()

function spawn3(obj, color, alt_click) --standalone fighter
  pos = self.getPosition()
  spawnparams = {
    type = 'Custom_Model',
    position          = {pos.x-3,pos.y+1,pos.z},
    rotation          = {0,0,0},
    scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
  }
  object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
  params = {
    mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626227161937/13F42031E6CCA3FE91FB6A8CFA54DD33F017E401/",
    collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626231792427/5E5B132190A889D837621DB1909D9EF60C03C671/",
    diffuse = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/999142626227195157/2A7A5C0E5AC5E5A16406F39990AD56BB897B22D6/",
    type = 1,
    material = 3,
  }
  object.setCustomObject(params)
  object.setName(color .. " Standalone Fighter")
  object.setColorTint(color)
  object.setVar('hl', color)
  object.setVar('panelID' , object.getName())
  --also spawn in a miniature
  spawnparams = {
    type = 'Custom_Model',
    position          = {pos.x-3,pos.y+2,pos.z-1.5},
    rotation          = {0,0,0},
    scale             = {x=1, y=1, z=1},
  }
  fighter = spawnObject(spawnparams)
  params = {
    mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771069904331659/5966B9333DB1B23272F7F5C736C23ED144D7F8A5/",
    collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/967616059748912163/706F2DCB160DFCD455616DA015F4253AFF341A95/",
    type = 1,
    material = 0,
  }
  fighter.setCustomObject(params)
  fighter.setName(color .. " Standalone Fighter")
  fighter.setColorTint(color)
  fighter.setVar('hl', color)
  object.setVar('mini', fighter)

  object.setVar('ooc', 0)
  object.setVar('speed' , 6)
  object.setVar('size' , 0)
  object.setVar('helm' , 0)
  object.setVar('guns' , 0)
  object.setVar('shields' , 0)
  object.setVar('cloak' , 0)

end

function makeTarget()
  object.setVar('ooc', 0)
  object.setVar('speed' , 6)
  object.setVar('size' , 0)
  object.setVar('helm' , 0)
  object.setVar('guns' , 0)
  object.setVar('shields' , 0)
  object.setVar('cloak' , 0)
  object.setVar('hull' , 0)
  object.setVar('hullcheck' , 0)
  object.setVar('display' , 0)
  object.setVar('mini' ,  object)
  object.setVar('panelID' , object.getName())
end

function spawn10(_obj, _color, alt_click) --target marker

  spawnparams = {
    type = 'Custom_Token',
    position          = {pos.x-3,pos.y+2,pos.z},
    rotation          = {0,180,0},
    scale             = {x=0.2, y=1, z=0.2},
  }
  object = spawnObject(spawnparams)
  params = {
    image = "https://i.imgur.com/L0R0ITQ.png",
    thickness = 0.2,
  }
  object.setCustomObject(params)
  object.setColorTint(_color)
    object.setName(_color .. ' Target')
    object.setVar('ooc', 0)
    object.setVar('speed' , 6)
    object.setVar('size' , 0)
    object.setVar('helm' , 0)
    object.setVar('guns' , 0)
    object.setVar('shields' , 0)
    object.setVar('cloak' , 0)
    object.setVar('hull' , 0)
    object.setVar('hullcheck' , 0)
    object.setVar('display' , 0)
    object.setVar('mini' ,  object)
    object.setVar('panelID' , object.getName())
end

function createHealthUI()

  local code_string = [[
  function updateSave()
      local data_to_save = {hp, hpmax, hpbarcolor, hl, hero}
      saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
      self.script_state = saved_data
  end

  function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
      local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
      hp = loaded_data[1]
      hpmax = loaded_data[2]
      hpbarcolor = loaded_data[3]
      hl = loaded_data[4]
      hero = loaded_data[5]
    end
    self.createButton({click_function = "barcolor", function_owner = self, label = hp .. "/" .. hpmax, position = {-0.1, 1.3, 0}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 750, height = 300, font_size = 200, color = {1,0,0,1}})
    self.createButton({click_function = "hpdn", function_owner = self, label = "-", position = {0.4, 1.2, 0.05}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 250, height = 250, font_size = 250})
    self.createButton({click_function = "hpup", function_owner = self, label = "+", position = {0.4, 1.4, -0.05}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 250, height = 250, font_size = 250})
    colorBar()
    updateSave()
    self.sticky = false
  end

  function hpup(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
      obj.setVar('hpmax', var+1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    else
      var = obj.getVar('hp')
      obj.setVar('hp', var+1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function hpdn(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
      obj.setVar('hpmax', var-1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    else
      var = obj.getVar('hp')
      obj.setVar('hp', var-1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function colorBar()
    if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
    if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {1,0,0,1}})
    elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0,1,0,1}})
    elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.2,0.2,0.8,1}})
    else
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.5,0.5,0.5,1}})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function barcolor(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
      if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
        hpbarcolor = 'green'
        colorBar()
      elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
        hpbarcolor = 'blue'
        colorBar()
      elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
        hpbarcolor = 'grey'
        colorBar()
      else
        hpbarcolor = 'red'
        colorBar()
      end
    end
  end

  function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
    object = collision_info.collision_object
    if object.getVar('hea') ~= nil then
      hp = object.getVar('hea')
      hpmax = object.getVar('hea')
      self.editButton({index=0, label = (hp .. '/' .. hpmax)})
      updateSave()
    end
    hpbarcolor = 'blue'
    colorBar()
  end
  ]]
  object.setLuaScript(code_string)
  --figure.reload()
  object.setVar("hp", -1)
  object.setVar("hpmax", -1)
end

function createHealthUI()

  local code_string = [[
  function updateSave()
      local data_to_save = {hp, hpmax, hpbarcolor, hl, hero}
      saved_data = JSON.encode(data_to_save)
      self.script_state = saved_data
  end

  function onload(saved_data)
    if saved_data ~= "" then
      local loaded_data = JSON.decode(saved_data)
      hp = loaded_data[1]
      hpmax = loaded_data[2]
      hpbarcolor = loaded_data[3]
      hl = loaded_data[4]
      hero = loaded_data[5]
    end
    self.createButton({click_function = "barcolor", function_owner = self, label = hp .. "/" .. hpmax, position = {-0.1, 1.3, 0}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 750, height = 300, font_size = 200, color = {1,0,0,1}})
    self.createButton({click_function = "hpdn", function_owner = self, label = "-", position = {0.4, 1.2, 0.05}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 250, height = 250, font_size = 250})
    self.createButton({click_function = "hpup", function_owner = self, label = "+", position = {0.4, 1.4, -0.05}, rotation = {-60, 0, 0}, scale = {0.5, 0.5, 0.5}, width = 250, height = 250, font_size = 250})
    colorBar()
    updateSave()
    self.sticky = false
  end

  function hpup(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
      obj.setVar('hpmax', var+1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    else
      var = obj.getVar('hp')
      obj.setVar('hp', var+1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function hpdn(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      var = obj.getVar('hpmax')
      obj.setVar('hpmax', var-1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    else
      var = obj.getVar('hp')
      obj.setVar('hp', var-1)
      obj.editButton({index=0, label = (obj.getVar('hp') .. '/' .. obj.getVar('hpmax'))})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function colorBar()
    if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
    if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {1,0,0,1}})
    elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0,1,0,1}})
    elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.2,0.2,0.8,1}})
    else
      self.editButton({index=0, color = {0.5,0.5,0.5,1}})
    end
    updateSave()
  end

  function barcolor(obj, color, alt)
    if alt == true then
      if hpbarcolor == nil then hpbarcolor = 'red' end
      if hpbarcolor == 'red' then
        hpbarcolor = 'green'
        colorBar()
      elseif hpbarcolor == 'green' then
        hpbarcolor = 'blue'
        colorBar()
      elseif hpbarcolor == 'blue' then
        hpbarcolor = 'grey'
        colorBar()
      else
        hpbarcolor = 'red'
        colorBar()
      end
    end
  end

  function onCollisionEnter(collision_info)
    object = collision_info.collision_object
    if object.getVar('hea') ~= nil then
      hp = object.getVar('hea')
      hpmax = object.getVar('hea')
      self.editButton({index=0, label = (hp .. '/' .. hpmax)})
      updateSave()
    end
    hpbarcolor = 'blue'
    colorBar()
  end
  ]]
  object.setLuaScript(code_string)
  --figure.reload()
  object.setVar("hp", -1)
  object.setVar("hpmax", -1)
end

    mesh = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/925960612634481828/70510B3E77F1711D5BDFDA0BB8FE9C127F564DE0/",
    diffuse = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/925960612634482200/117988C138E5370B88177C065025F792DA1004AF/",
    collider = "http://cloud-3.steamusercontent.com/ugc/1004771069908980106/5B79587E5AECC3DFC3AADA55B4C6961760E6E9DF/",
    type = 1,
    material = 0,
  }
  object.setCustomObject(params)
  object.setColorTint(color)
  object.setVar('hl', color)
